attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Dear Miss Brown

We have rejected this petition as we cannot host petitions on individual cases such as yours, however we have passed your request onto the Downing Street Direct Communications Team who will ensure that it is forwarded to the relevant government department.

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
